announcement.description: UI fonts to ease dyslexia, updated translations for Chinese Simplified and Brazilian Portuguese, new u.distance and u.direction methods, and dozens of fixes and polishing touches ðŸ’…

games.title: There's a house in the sky
games.author: jsmonzani
games.description: A simple and serene hill building game for minijam 173 with theme "Action" and constraint "From the top".

games.author: Metal Harbor
games.title: Cleopawtra
games.description: Play as Cleopawtra and rescue your husband, Meowrc Antony. An entry to the recent ct.js jam!

games.title: Cat-Apocalypse
games.author: macro21KGB
games.description: This game, created for the ct.js game jam, casts you as a blue cat from the future on a mission to save the dinosaurs from extinction using his deadliest weapon... yarn balls.

games.title: Pronipbition
games.description: You're a parched cat looking for some real drinks in the city. Explore the streets and chat with locals to find the secret location of the speakeasy in this vaguely historically inspired adventure game! An entry to the recent ct.js jam!
games.author: Firecakes

games.title: Hollow Floor
games.author: Ahmed Khalifa, Pete Gresser
games.description: Hollow Floor is an exploration-based single-sitting Metroidvania inspired by VVVVVV and REDDER. Hollow Floor is a relaxed game that is full of secrets and hard challenges that can be tackled at any moment in the game or completely ignored. Checkout the demo and buy on Steam!

games.author: Crimson Games IO / UlisesFreitas
games.description: Crimson Hero Quest is an engaging platformer game that invites players into a captivating pixel art world rendered in charming 16x16 graphics. Set in a vibrant universe, players embark on a heroic journey through lush forests and formidable castles.
games.title: Crimson Hero Quest
Crazy One (open for playtests!)
games.author: tariq
games.description: A game where you try to break through a very heavy hatch by dumping everything you find on it while pew-pewing monsters in procedurally generated levels. Different heroes and weapons to choose, andâ€¦ pills??

games.title: Triverse
games.author: Thomas
games.description: ðŸ”ºTriverseðŸ”º is a puzzle game: make geometric shapes composed of triangles and hexagons.

games.title: CoMiGo and the Vacation of Fusions
games.author: Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych
games.description: Explore the sea, fuse elements to shape your own island, and take selfies!

learn.title: Making a twin-stick shooter with Catnip
learn.author: CoMiGo, Firecakes
learn.description: In this tutorial we will dive into programming with Catnip by making a retro-styled twin-stick shooter. We will make a simple AI for mobs, GUI, and behaviors for gameplay logic sharing.

learn.title: Learn Catnip
learn.author: CoMiGo
learn.description: The new section in official docs is a short introduction to the new programming language. Learn about block and variable types, how to work with copies, and how to construct complex conditions and work with loops.

learn.title: Visual scripting in ct.js â€” introduction
learn.author: William MC / Exceptional 3D tutorials
learn.description: New updates to ct.js game engine opens up a hole new world of possibilities for visual coders.

learn.title: Making text and button in ct.js using visual scripting (Catnip)
learn.author: William MC / Exceptional 3D tutorials
learn.description: Using buttons and text in ct.js for game development.

learn.title: Making Games: Platformer
learn.author: Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych, Firecakes
learn.description: In this tutorial, we will create a small platformer with diamonds, checkpoints, moving platforms, and traps! You will learn how to detect collisions, use them to create a side-view movement, and how to manipulate sprites and move the player between levels.
